idea:
Bauenstark Infra is as a group of individuals who are focused on addressing infrastructure problems with novel technology and products. With this endeavor, we represent a German company with a product for Asphalt roads.

Duroflex - is an asphalt mix additive, which unlike its conventional competitors is not added to bitumen but to the grit. This product increases the strength and durability of asphalt roads and helps keep them

maintenance free for a long time. Though innovative and extremely effective, our product does not require any special machinery or procedures for hot-mix paved roads.
name: BAUENSTARK INFRA

idea:
We help people achieve financial freedom so that they can achieve their true potential.

Financial freedom means retiring early, with a purpose. The 'Frugal Mogul' method, FrugMo in short, will help you achieve financial freedom without compromise. It will help you lead a lifestyle of abundance, but oCne that is built on sensible frugality and sustainability.

Our 3-step process is an extremely powerful and yet easy formula to achieve financial freedom the FrugMo way. It gives you total control over how you live your life, while you work towards becoming financially free. It helps you decide how much and where to invest, and how soon you want to be financially free.

Explore more at www.FrugMo.com and set yourself up for financial freedom.
name: FrugMo Advisors Private Limited
